biotools.summary:
Calling somatic mutations with a tumor- and site-specific prior.

Implements BATCAVE: Bayesian Analysis Tools for Context-Aware Variant Evaluation.

This package is an implementation of the BATCAVE algorithm described in Mannakee et al. .... The algorithm is a post-variant-calling filter for variants that incorporates a tumor-and-site-specific prior probability of mutation

bioschemas.name: BATCAVE
